response.overview: 12-year-old scout Bimo chases his mischievous squirrel friend Pai and awakens TankDog, a rusting war machine crowned with a canine head. Despite Pai’s mistrust, Bimo befriends the gentle giant, igniting playful forest escapades. But a single rubber-bullet “shot” plunges TankDog into traumatic wartime memories, triggering a destructive rampage that traps Pai beneath a fallen branch. As chaos erupts, Bimo bravely shields his friend—reminding TankDog of a child’s compassion from his past. Faith in humanity restored, TankDog quells his frenzy and embraces a new mission: protecting and playing alongside his unlikely companions.
response.tagline: :TankDog, a war machine from the past is awakened   by Bimo, an adventurous boy scout. As past   memories of war resurface, Bimo must show the   compassion of humanity to give TankDog a new   purpose.
response.title: TankDog
